A letter to the true Protestant doctor, the Reverend Titus Oates, Dean of Salamanca, and Bishop of Weavers-Hall, at his apartment in Southwark, from Timothy Trimmer his friend in London Trimmer, Timothy.
1 sheet ([2] p.)
Printed by George Croom ..., London : 1684.
Caption title. Broadside. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
